byline.contributor: Bhadra Sharma contributed reporting from Katmandu, Nepal, and Conor Dougherty from New York.

abstract: Earthquake in Nepal causes multiple avalanches on Mount Everest, slamming into base camp and killing at least 17 climbers; at least 37 others are injured; officials fear death toll could reach hundreds.
lead_paragraph: The avalanche rumbled down a treacherous icefall into a mountaineering base camp, killing at least 17 climbers and injuring an untold number of others, officials said.

headline.main: Everest Climbers Are Killed as Nepal Quake Sets Off Avalanche
headline.print_headline: Mount Everest Climbers Killed as Quake Causes Avalanche

snippet: The avalanche rumbled down a treacherous icefall into a mountaineering base camp, killing at least 17 climbers and injuring an untold number of others, officials said.
